item.title: Kubernetes Cluster set up
item.description: Setting up Kubernets cluster A Three node cluster is going to set up and all machies are having Ubuntu 20.04 Installed and Updated Prerequisites : VM with atleast 2GB of RAM and Ubuntu Ubuntu 20.04 Note : the following steps need to carried out in master and worker nodes The following applications needs to be installed vim git curl wget apt-transport-https docker Make sure sure system repositories and apps are updated
